meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Bozek Peter Diedrich Rachel Zoch Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7248.

td.p: John Bozek, an economic development professional from New York, New York
Peter Diedrich, an attorney from Sierra Madre, California
Rachel Zoch, a writer and editor from Deer Park, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $4,700)

tr.td: (Alex: Now if you visit museums, you will probably always...)
EXIT THROUGH THE GIFT SHOP
BIBLE BOOKS IN POP MUSIC
FASHION
WHAT'S YOUR MOVIE PROFESSION?
MISSING LINKS
THIS IS "D" PLACE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Jimmy of the Clue Crew reports from Valley Forge Nat\'l Historical Park in Pennsylvania.) At the Valley Forge Encampment Store, treat yourself to a pencil sharpener version of this man\'s headquarters')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_6_5', 'clue_J_6_5_stuck', '(Peter: What is [*]?)
(Alex: You didn\'t ring in.)
(Peter: Oh. Sorry.)
[Peter furiously tries to ring in, but too late.]
(Alex: John.)
(John: What is [*]?)
(Alex: What is [*]? Yes.)
[Laughter]
(Alex: Peter might\'ve thought it was another Daily Double just for him.)
(Peter: I... did.)

Delft

John
')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

Peter
John

Peter
John
REMEMBERING THE ALAMO
AT "BAT"
DOGGONE GOOD WRITING
TED
THE LAST MAN
ON EARTH

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
